ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class ClaimantAddItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.ClaimantAddItemController

  • public class ClaimantAddItemController
extends java.lang.Object
    This ClaimantAddItemController class is a controller class of Item, ItemList and Claim. By calling this class, user(claimant) can add a Item/code> with its detail to the itemList in claim.
    Version:
    03/16/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    DateFormat, ParseException, SimpleDateFormat, Date, Locale

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String dateSTR,
           java.lang.String category,
           java.lang.String description,
           java.lang.Double amount,
           java.lang.String currency)
             throws StatusException
        This method will create a new String variable dateSTR, category, description and currency, and a Double variable amount, all to the Item. Then set a boolean variable missValueto to justify the Item. It also gonna notify all Listener in listeners list about this update.
        Parameters:
        dateSTR - a String variable
        category - a String variable
        description - a String variable
        amount - a Double variable
        currency - a String variable
        Throws:
        StatusException
        See Also:
        DateFormat, ParseException, SimpleDateFormat, Date, Locale
